body.p:
Hartford Ky June 8^th^/64
Hon Thos. E. Bramlett Governor of Ky_
Sir

I addressed you a few lines some two months ago in behalf of my neighbors Moses Baer & also for Jonothan Raley both of whom have been fined for retailing liquors &c. You will please release them of a portion if you can do so in discharge of your duties as
You will please excuse me for addressing you again upon these subjects -- for the circumstances I refer you to the petitions in each case

I myself take the liberty to ask you to remit my fine I know that I have done wrong but I never will do so anymore. Please excuse me if I ask to much, if I would, be able to work I would not ask you for what I did. I have paid all other cost. I am 24 years old and 4 feet and five inches high and always sick.
I ask once more please do the best you can about the matter you oblije
